title: 35 Away
body: Riot please donate me 35 Rp I'm buying 10$ Rp and I'm going to be 35 short for a name change

replies.body: We can't really do much for this on the boards, but you should definitely shoot our [**support staff**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) a ticket about this though ^_^.
